text:
EFRAG is funded by the European Union through the Single Market
Programme in which the EEA-EFTA countries (Norway, Iceland and
Liechtenstein), as well as Kosovo participate. Any views and opinions
expressed are however those of the author(s) only and do not
necessarily reflect those of the European Union, the European
Commission or of countries that participate in the Single Market
Programme. Neither the European Union, the European Commission
